product_description: These Oxford Ruled Index Cards are a smart, stylish solution for organizing notes, studying and staying productive. Each pack includes 200 durable 3 x 5 inch cards in four assorted pastel colors: pink, blue, green and yellow. Whether you're prepping flashcards for exams, outlining a presentation or jotting down quick reminders, these lined index cards offer a clean writing surface that keeps your thoughts clear and structured. Made from sturdy cardstock, these cards resist bending and tearing, making them ideal for frequent handling in classrooms, offices or on the go. The ruled lines help maintain neat handwriting and consistent spacing, while the assorted pastel colors allow for easy color coding by subject, priority or category. Their compact size fits perfectly in backpacks, purses or desk drawers so you can take your notes anywhere. Perfect for students, teachers, professionals and creatives, these index cards are versatile tools for boosting memory, organizing ideas and streamlining your workflow. Use them for study aids, recipe cards, brainstorming sessions or DIY projects. 4 assorted colors: pink, blue, green and yellow. 3" x 5". 200 lined cards per pack.
